properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 8 at 12:31AM PST until January 8 at 12:18PM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Washington...

Satsop River Near Satsop affecting Grays Harbor County
Snohomish River At Snohomish affecting Snohomish County
Snoqualmie River Near Carnation affecting King County
Skokomish River At Potlatch affecting Mason County

A cold front moved east of the area Tuesday evening. Precipitation
rates decreased significantly behind the front. Snow levels have
lowered down to around 3000 feet and will continue to lower today.
The rivers have crested and will continue to recede today.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Satsop River Near Satsop
* Until this afternoon.
* At 12:15 AM Wednesday the stage was 38.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 38.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Forecast...The river crested at 39.2 feet at 4 PM Tuesday and will
continue to fall to below flood stage early this morning.
* Impact...At 38.0 feet, the Satsop River will flood low pasture lands
and some roads along the river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars...vans...or trucks through flooded areas...this is
the cause of most flood related deaths in Washington. Be alert for
rapid changes and monitor developments by listening to NOAA Weather
radio or other local media.
